title: The ultimate silver lining — Jack Dorsey gives a third of his shares back to Twitter employees
text:
The ultimate silver lining — Jack Dorsey gives a third of his shares back to Twitter employees 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Christmas is coming early for what's left of Twitter's workforce -- those who survived the slashing of 8 percent of the employee base have n...
